page.title: 13SCOUTS AND CUBS
page.content: {Scouts}is an organization where you can work for badges and play games.They have just made a new way of getting certain badges.You have a book in which you mark down the activities you want to do.There are age groups for each of the badges and when you finish one you go straight on to the next.Some of the badges we have to do at home.There are swimming,athletics collecters and others.When you get older you can do sailing,rock climbing and other sports like that.I go for one hour forty-five minutes.The games we play are non-stop Cricket,Trenches, Circles,Captain is Coming Aboard and others.The Scouts also go swimming on Sunday morning at about seven o'clock. We go to indoor pools and an outdoor pool.The outdoor pool is near Abberley Clock Tower.We also go on camps without the leaders.
